description:
Sensei challenge you! This is a hardcore arcade game in which you will need to complete level in less than 5 seconds!

5.0 - infinite arcade game focusing on making the high score and gets to the top of the leaderboard! You will play as a young ninja who needs to get to his sensei avoiding all obstacles on his way. 5 seconds to complete the level, or die trying! Levels will change randomly and so do the locations of your sensei. It`s a real challenge even for hardcore gamers.
Do you think you can master it? Then show to yourself and your sensei who is a real ninja here!

Features:
- 40 unique levels
- simple control
- dynamic gameplay
- cool pixel art
- oldschool style
- achievements
- no text, only pure action. Serious.
